abstract: Prosecution and defense conclude their arguments in trial against New York Police Detective Wojciech Braszczok and Robert Sims, who have been charged with gang assault and other charges for their role in attack on Alexian Lien in New York City in 2013; both men have waived right to jury and Justice Maxwell Wiley will decide the case; men had been participating in biker rally at time of assault.
lead_paragraph: The prosecution and defense summed up their cases on Friday in the trial of two motorcyclists charged with beating up a driver during a raucous biker rally in 2013.

headline.main: 2 Defendants in Manhattan Biker Assault Await Verdict From Judge
headline.print_headline: 2 Defendants in Biker Case Await Verdict From Judge

snippet: The prosecution and defense summed up their cases on Friday in the trial of two motorcyclists charged with beating up a driver during a raucous biker rally in 2013.
